name: Fairy Tail: Brave Saga
summary: In this Puzzle RPG, a party of up to five characters from the Fairy Tail series are utilized to complete quests. Through a sequence of turn-based battles, the player uses their touchscreen to match the same color Lacrima to build up attacks. The greater number of Lacrima chained in a set amount of time, the stronger the units' actions become.
